atod package¶

This is the library for getting DotA2 insight information.

Problem:
there was no way to get dota internal data about heroes, their abilities… in suitable for further work form.
Solution:
this library allows you to get access to all the data in the in-game files. But information about single hero does not have much use, so there is a way to get stats of selected heroes or get information about certain match.
